events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry based on the mention of returning the product and money back.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in refund processing.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so that I can assist you further?
Sure, the order number is 987654321. The jacket is too small, and I'd like a refund instead of an exchange.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once you return the jacket. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds good, thank you! I will send the jacket back as soon as I get the shipping label.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just following up to confirm that you have returned the jacket and if your refund has been received successfully.
Yes, the jacket was delivered back yesterday and the refund has appeared on my credit card. Thanks for your help!
We are glad to hear your refund was processed successfully. Closing this case now. Feel free to contact us again anytime.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to you. We appreciate your feedback to improve our services.
